boofcv.alg.fiducial.calib.squares

Class SquareNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • boofcv.alg.fiducial.calib.squares.SquareNode

  • public class SquareNode
extends java.lang.Object
    Graph representation of square blobs. Each blob can be connected to at most 4 other shapes which are directly adjacent of one of the sides.
